00013 static Resource *quadEncoders = NULL;
00014 
00025 void Encoder::InitEncoder(bool reverseDirection, EncodingType encodingType)
00026 {
00027     m_encodingType = encodingType;
00028     switch (encodingType)
00029     {
00030     case k4X:
00031         Resource::CreateResourceObject(&quadEncoders, tEncoder::kNumSystems);
00032         //TODO: need to check for errors here
00033         m_index = quadEncoders->Allocate();
00034         m_encoder = new tEncoder(m_index, &status);
00035         m_encoder->writeConfig_ASource_Module(m_aSource->GetModuleForRouting(), &status);
00036         m_encoder->writeConfig_ASource_Channel(m_aSource->GetChannelForRouting(), &status);
00037         m_encoder->writeConfig_ASource_AnalogTrigger(m_aSource->GetAnalogTriggerForRouting(), &status);
00038         m_encoder->writeConfig_BSource_Module(m_bSource->GetModuleForRouting(), &status);
00039         m_encoder->writeConfig_BSource_Channel(m_bSource->GetChannelForRouting(), &status);
00040         m_encoder->writeConfig_BSource_AnalogTrigger(m_bSource->GetAnalogTriggerForRouting(), &status);
00041         m_encoder->strobeReset(&status);
00042         m_encoder->writeConfig_Reverse(reverseDirection, &status);
00043         m_encoder->writeTimerConfig_AverageSize(4, &status);
00044         m_counter = NULL;
00045         break;
00046     case k1X:
00047     case k2X:
00048         m_counter = new Counter(m_encodingType, m_aSource, m_bSource, reverseDirection);
00049         break;
00050     }
00051     m_distancePerPulse = 1.0;
00052     m_pidSource = kDistance;
00053     wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00054 }

00071 Encoder::Encoder(UINT32 aSlot, UINT32 aChannel,
00072                         UINT32 bSlot, UINT32 bChannel,
00073                         bool reverseDirection, EncodingType encodingType)
00074 {
00075     m_aSource = new DigitalInput(aSlot, aChannel);
00076     m_bSource = new DigitalInput(bSlot, bChannel);
00077     InitEncoder(reverseDirection, encodingType);
00078     m_allocatedASource = true;
00079     m_allocatedBSource = true;
00080 }

00096 {

00098     m_bSource = new DigitalInput(bChannel);
00099     InitEncoder(reverseDirection, encodingType);
00100     m_allocatedASource = true;
00101     m_allocatedBSource = true;

00119 Encoder::Encoder(DigitalSource *aSource, DigitalSource *bSource, bool reverseDirection, EncodingType encodingType)
00120 {
00121     m_aSource = aSource;
00122     m_bSource = bSource;
00123     m_allocatedASource = false;
00124     m_allocatedBSource = false;
00125     if (m_aSource == NULL || m_bSource == NULL)
00126         wpi_fatal(NullParameter);
00127     else
00128         InitEncoder(reverseDirection, encodingType);
00129 }

00146 Encoder::Encoder(DigitalSource &aSource, DigitalSource &bSource, bool reverseDirection, EncodingType encodingType)
00147 {
00148     m_aSource = &aSource;
00149     m_bSource = &bSource;
00150     m_allocatedASource = false;
00151     m_allocatedBSource = false;
00152     InitEncoder(reverseDirection, encodingType);
00153 }

00159 Encoder::~Encoder()
00160 {
00161     if (m_allocatedASource) delete m_aSource;
00162     if (m_allocatedBSource) delete m_bSource;
00163     if (m_counter)
00164     {
00165         delete m_counter;
00166     }
00167     else
00168     {
00169         quadEncoders->Free(m_index);
00170         delete m_encoder;
00171     }
00172 }

00178 void Encoder::Start()
00179 {
00180     if (m_counter)
00181         m_counter->Start();
00182     else
00183     {
00184         m_encoder->writeConfig_Enable(1, &status);
00185         wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00186     }
00187 }
00188 
00192 void Encoder::Stop()
00193 {
00194     if (m_counter)
00195         m_counter->Stop();
00196     else
00197     {
00198         m_encoder->writeConfig_Enable(0, &status);
00199         wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00200     }
00201 }

00209 INT32 Encoder::GetRaw()
00210 {
00211     INT32 value;
00212     if (m_counter)
00213         value = m_counter->Get();
00214     else
00215     {
00216         value = m_encoder->readOutput_Value(&status);
00217         wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00218     }
00219     return value;
00220 }
00221 
00229 INT32 Encoder::Get()
00230 {
00231     return (INT32) (GetRaw() * DecodingScaleFactor());
00232 }
00233 
00238 void Encoder::Reset()
00239 {
00240     if (m_counter)
00241         m_counter->Reset();
00242     else
00243     {
00244         m_encoder->strobeReset(&status);
00245         wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00246     }
00247 }
00248 
00258 double Encoder::GetPeriod()
00259 {
00260     double measuredPeriod;
00261     if (m_counter)
00262     {
00263         measuredPeriod = m_counter->GetPeriod();
00264     }
00265     else
00266     {
00267         tEncoder::tTimerOutput output = m_encoder->readTimerOutput(&status);
00268         double value;
00269         if (output.Stalled)
00270         {
00271             // Return infinity
00272             double zero = 0.0;
00273             value = 1.0 / zero;
00274         }
00275         else
00276         {
00277             // output.Period is a fixed point number that counts by 2 (24 bits, 25 integer bits)
00278             value = (double)(output.Period << 1) / (double)output.Count;
00279         }
00280         wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00281         measuredPeriod = value * 1.0e-6;
00282     }
00283     return measuredPeriod / DecodingScaleFactor();
00284 }
00285 
00298 void Encoder::SetMaxPeriod(double maxPeriod)
00299 {
00300     if (m_counter)
00301     {
00302         m_counter->SetMaxPeriod(maxPeriod * DecodingScaleFactor());
00303     }
00304     else
00305     {
00306         m_encoder->writeTimerConfig_StallPeriod((UINT32)(maxPeriod * 1.0e6 * DecodingScaleFactor()), &status);
00307         wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00308     }
00309 }
00310 
00318 bool Encoder::GetStopped()
00319 {
00320     if (m_counter)
00321     {
00322         return m_counter->GetStopped();
00323     }
00324     else
00325     {
00326         bool value = m_encoder->readTimerOutput_Stalled(&status) != 0;
00327         wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00328         return value;
00329     }
00330 }
00331 
00336 bool Encoder::GetDirection()
00337 {
00338     if (m_counter)
00339     {
00340         return m_counter->GetDirection();
00341     }
00342     else
00343     {
00344         bool value = m_encoder->readOutput_Direction(&status);
00345         wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00346         return value;
00347     }
00348 }
00349 
00353 double Encoder::DecodingScaleFactor()
00354 {
00355     switch (m_encodingType)
00356     {
00357     case k1X:
00358         return 1.0;
00359     case k2X:
00360         return 0.5;
00361     case k4X:
00362         return 0.25;
00363     default:
00364         return 0.0;
00365     }   
00366 }
00367 
00373 double Encoder::GetDistance()
00374 {
00375     return GetRaw() * DecodingScaleFactor() * m_distancePerPulse;
00376 }
00377 
00384 double Encoder::GetRate()
00385 {
00386     return (m_distancePerPulse / GetPeriod());
00387 }
00388 
00394 void Encoder::SetMinRate(double minRate)
00395 {
00396     SetMaxPeriod(m_distancePerPulse / minRate);
00397 }
00398 
00410 void Encoder::SetDistancePerPulse(double distancePerPulse)
00411 {
00412     m_distancePerPulse = distancePerPulse;
00413 }

00421 void Encoder::SetReverseDirection(bool reverseDirection)
00422 {
00423     if (m_counter)
00424     {
00425         m_counter->SetReverseDirection(reverseDirection);
00426     }
00427     else
00428     {
00429         m_encoder->writeConfig_Reverse(reverseDirection, &status);
00430         wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00431     }
00432 }

00439 void Encoder::SetPIDSourceParameter(PIDSourceParameter pidSource)
00440 {
00441     m_pidSource = pidSource;
00442 }
00443 
00449 double Encoder::PIDGet()
00450 {
00451     switch (m_pidSource)
00452     {
00453     case kDistance:
00454         return GetDistance();
00455     case kRate:
00456         return GetRate();
00457     default:
00458         return 0.0;
00459     }
00460 }
